data.title: Discover SiteGround's Company Culture
data.meta_description: See what SiteGround is all about, how the company started, and who are the faces behind the brand.
data.text:
We hire the best

people & train them

to become top experts.

Smart, open-minded, hard-working, friendly people with an eagerness to overcome challenges - that's the type of people that work at SiteGround and service your website. We pick our co-workers carefully, because being able to count on and learn from each other is important. Every new SiteGrounder goes through a series of extensive trainings and we believe this is the best investment in the future of the company.

We invest in our

employeesâ€™ happiness.

Happy people are eager to grow and make the impossible possible. That's why we invest in our employees' happiness. We make sure our offices are comfortable and inspiring places and consciously motivate our people to pursue a healthy work-life balance. We believe these efforts foster a friendly and creative environment where our people develop smart technologies and innovative business solutions.

We deliver high-quality innovation, and top support expertise.

When you put the right people together in a team, you always get top results. At SiteGround, this awesome mix of great people spikes technical innovation, boosts the level of expertise, and guarantees a high quality of service. Visit our blog to see what's been cooking lately.
